response.explain: The previous action code failed because it tried to access a non-existent 'distance' attribute of the 'tray' object. The 'distance' attribute is not a part of the 'DatasetObject' class, hence the error. The 'distance' attribute is provided in the 'Observed Objects' information, not in the object itself. Therefore, we need to revise the subtasks to avoid this error.
response.subtask:
(1) Register the stove.
(2) Move the robot to the stove.
(3) Register the tray.
(4) Grasp the tray.
(5) Put the tray on the stove.
(6) Put the bacon on the tray.
(7) Cook the bacon.
